data.content:
I’m sorry—I wasn’t able to retrieve a description of the image you supplied. The attempt to run the **describe_image** agent failed due to a network error, so I don’t have any visual details to share.

If you can re‑upload the image (or provide a different link), I’ll run the description again and give you a clear, concise overview of what’s shown. Let me know how you’d like to proceed!

task_agent_pairs.task_description: Generate a detailed textual description of the image provided by the user, covering the main subjects, setting, objects, colors, actions, and any notable details.

primary.name: Orbimesh Image Analysis Agent
primary.description: Analyzes image files from a local path to answer questions about their content using Groq's LLaMA 4 vision model.

endpoints.description: Takes a local file path to an image and a query, and returns a textual analysis of the image's content. The agent will handle opening, compressing, and encoding the image.

parameters.name: image_path
parameters.description: The local server path to the image file to be analyzed.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The user's question about the image (e.g., 'What is the main subject of this image?').

final_response:
I’m sorry—I wasn’t able to retrieve a description of the image you supplied. The attempt to run the **describe_image** agent failed due to a network error, so I don’t have any visual details to share.
